title: Provides that employees of school districts who are suspended on charges of sex with a minor or student must furnish security in order to get wages
summary: Provides that employees of school districts who are suspended on charges of sex with a minor or student must furnish security in order to get wages.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to providing that employees who are suspended due to sexual offense charges may only receive salary if they provide security
